metadata.title: CVE-2022-21125 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Incomplete cleanup of microarchitectural fill buffers on some Intel(R)Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21125` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu1
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-15.15
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 5.19.0-15.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.19.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.19.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-azure - 5.19.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-gcp - 5.19.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-ibm - 5.19.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency - 5.19.0-1003.3
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency-64k - 5.19.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-oracle - 5.19.0-1004.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu1').
linux package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-15.15').
linux-kvm package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1004.4').
linux-aws package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1005.5').
linux-azure package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1004.4').
linux-gcp package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1004.4').
linux-ibm package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1004.4').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1003.3').
linux-oracle package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1004.4').
